text: Kunsttijdschrift Vlaanderen is a Belgian cultural and litarary magazine with many illustrations. As a paper version it was published between 1952 and 2017. It started with the name West-Vlaanderen (CVKV) and from 1966 as Vlaanderen. Due to the loss of subsidies, it is only published online since 2017. There were five hard copy editions per year, and later four online publications per year. It is published in Dutch and focuses on arts, literature and general culture in Flanders. ==Other websites== * Category:Magazines of Europe Category:Belgian culture Category:1952 establishments in Europe
title: Kunsttijdschrift Vlaanderen
